text: This is a list of prime ministers of Chad since the formation of the post of Prime Minister of Chad in 1978 to the present day. ==Key== ;Political parties * * * * * * * * ;Other factions * ;Status * ==List of officeholders== The following is a list of heads of government of Chad, since the country gained independence from France in 1960. Portrait Name Term of office Political party Took office Left office Gabriel Lisette 14 May 1957 11 February 1959 Gontchomé Sahoulba 11 February 1959 12 March 1959 GIRT Ahmed Koulamallah 12 March 1959 26 March 1959 François Tombalbaye 26 March 1959 1975 Noël Milarew Odingar 1975 1975 Military Félix Malloum 1975 1979 Military Hissène Habré 1978 1979 Goukouni Oueddei 1979 1979 Lol Mahamat Choua 1979 1979 MPLT Goukouni Oueddei 1979 1982 Djidingar Dono Ngardoum 1982 1982 RUDT Hissène Habré 1982 1990 Acheikh ibn Oumar 2 December 1990 2 December 1990 Military Djidingar Dono Ngardoum 2 December 1990 2 December 1990 Military Idriss Déby 2 December 1990 4 March 1991 Military Jean Alingué Bawoyeu 1991 1992 UDR Joseph Yodoyman 1992 1993 UNDR Fidèle Moungar 1993 1993 ACTUS Delwa Kassiré Koumakoye 1993 1995 VIVA–RNDP Koibla Djimasta 1995 1997 UDR Nassour Guelendouksia Ouaido 1997 1999 MPS Nagoum Yamassoum 1999 2002 MPS Haroun Kabadi 2002 2003 MPS Moussa Faki 2003 2005 MPS Pascal Yoadimnadji 2005 2007 MPS Adoum Younousmi 2007 2007 MPS Delwa Kassiré Koumakoye 2007 2008 VIVA–RNDP Youssouf Saleh Abbas 2008 2010 Independent Emmanuel Nadingar 2010 2013 MPS Djimrangar Dadnadji 2013 2013 MPS Kalzeubet Pahimi Deubet 2013 2016 MPS Albert Pahimi Padacké 2016 2021 RNDT–Le Réveil 2021 2022 RNDT–Le Réveil Saleh Kebzabo 2022 2024 UNDR Succès Masra 2024 2024 Independent Allamaye Halina 2024 Incumbent Independent ==Other websites== *World Statesmen – Chad *
title: List of prime ministers of Chad
